item.title: Need help with kick and mute command
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“kick”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
String kicked = command.substring(5);
int kick = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(kicked);

		if (kick != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[kick];
			sendMsg("You have successfully kicked "+kicked+".");
			p.disconnected = true;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} else {
			sendMsg("The name you have tried to kick, does not exist or is not online.");
		}
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMsg("Try entering a name you want to kick.");
	}[/code]

[code]if (command.startsWith(“unmute”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
String unmuted = command.substring(7);
int unmute = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(unmuted);
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[unmute];

	if (unmute != 0) {
		sendMsg("You successfully un-muted "+unmuted+".");
		p.Muted = 0;
		p.savechar();
		p.sendMsg(""+playerName+" has un-muted you.");
		p.updateRequired = true; 
		p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	} else {
		sendMsg("The player you have tried to un-mute isn't online, or doesn't excist.");
	    }
	} catch(Exception e) {
		sendMsg("Try entering the name you want to un-mute.");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with kick and mute command
